body: We will fix it I think. I'll take a look soon.
1.3.2 will contain this fix and shouldn't be too far away

Awesome, thanks for looking into it!

repository.name: less4j
repository.description: Less language is an extension of css and less4j compiles it into regular css. Less adds several dynamic features into css: variables, expressions, nested rules, and so on. Less was designed to be compatible with css and any correct css file is also correct less file.

issue.title: Cannot use variables with background-image: url(); and less.js
less nested rule
